        Set online PIN input to support bypass; Offline PIN support bypass needs to be set in ICS
        Parameters:
        byPass - true:support. false:not support.

      • getMaxPinLen

        public int getMaxPinLen()

      • setMaxPinLen

        public void setMaxPinLen(int maxPinLen)
        Set the maximum length of PIN code input. The maximum length must not be greater than 15.
        Parameters:
        maxPinLen - Maximum length of PIN code.

      • getOptionZeroPinLen

        public int getOptionZeroPinLen()

      • setOptionZeroPinLen

        public void setOptionZeroPinLen(int optionZeroPinLen)
        "SetOnlinePinByPass" is configured as not supported. When the PIN code is not entered, the configuration will be processed after pressing the ok key;
        Parameters:
        optionZeroPinLen - 0- do not respond to the button; 1- return ERR_PIN_LENGTH_ERR.

      • getOptionPinLenLessThanMinValue

        public int getOptionPinLenLessThanMinValue()

      • setOptionPinLenLessThanMinValue

        public void setOptionPinLenLessThanMinValue(int optionPinLenLessThanMinValue)
        Configure the processing of pressing the ok key when the length of the input PIN code is less than the minimum length;
        Parameters:
        optionPinLenLessThanMinValue - 0- do not respond to the button; 1- return ERR_PIN_LENGTH_ERR.

      • getOptionFixedPinLen

        public int getOptionFixedPinLen()

      • setOptionFixedPinLen

        public void setOptionFixedPinLen(int optionFixedPinLen)
        When the maximum length and minimum length of the PIN code input are set to be equal, the fixed length of the PIN code is considered to be set at this time. This item configures the operation when the length of the input PIN code reaches a fixed length.
        Parameters:
        optionFixedPinLen - 0-Do not process and wait for the user to press the ok button; 1-Automatically start the verification and return the result.

      • getOptionAllowGreaterThanMaxValue

        public int getOptionAllowGreaterThanMaxValue()

      • setOptionAllowGreaterThanMaxValue

        public void setOptionAllowGreaterThanMaxValue(int optionAllowGreaterThanMaxValue)
        Enter the PIN code length is greater than the set maximum length policy configuration
        Parameters:
        optionAllowGreaterThanMaxValue - 0- do not respond to the button; 1- return ERR_PIN_LENGTH_ERR.
